author: Staff Reporter
text:
A National Lok Adalat on revenue and civil matters will be held on the premises of the Union Territory of Puducherry Legal Services Authority Complex, No.3, Lal Bahadur Shastri Street, on Saturday.

During the occasion, cheques towards payment of compensation to the tune of Rs 3.58 crore to 23 claimants in Land Acquisition Cases will be disbursed.
title: Lok Adalat on revenue cases today
